string.value: Lana says the freesia scent is perfect for the Female Mannequin's Wig. Better tell #bLala#k.
Rush to #bLana#k before the scent fades and ask her which costume this lavender scent would best complement.
#bLana#k said the lavender scent wasn't exactly perfect for the Fedora, but that it would work. \r\nAsk #bLana#k what other tasks are left on her to-do list.

string.name: message
string.value: 달콤한 라벤더향기가 온몸을 감싸는 순간 이상하게 머리가 아프고 발걸음이 무거워 진다. 향기가 사라지기 전에 라나에게 가보자.

The freesia scent goes with the Wig. Got it. So now we're left with the Blue Perfume and the Fedora, but ugh, I don't think the two go together at all. What do you think? \r\n#L0##bI don't know. I don't think we have any other choice.#l\n#k
But I really don't think these work. I'm sorry, but could you ask #bLana#k one last time?
I've sprayed the Blue Perfume on you. Rush to #bLana#k before the lavender scent fades.
This is the last favor I need from you.

Hm, so you want me to tell you which scent goes well with which costume again? \r\n#L0##bYes, we only have the Male Mannequin's Fedora and this lavender-scented perfume, but Lala says these two just don't go with each other. She wanted your opinion.#l\n#k
I think a citrus smell would go great with the Fedora, but we can work with the lavender. We have more things to take care of, so we can't be waste time. Let's just go with that.
I'll tell #bLala#k myself. Could you help me with the next thing on my list? What's next... Oh, we don't have any music. We must decide on the songs Blake will perform.
What smell? Why don't you ask Lala to spray you with more perfume?
Please hurry to #bLana#k and ask her before the scent fades.
